name: Farm-a-Sea
description:
You play as a young mermaid that has bought land outside the city of Atlantis. Using this land, you will attempt to farm, sea based plant-life that you will then sell to Henry for profit. The money that you will receive from doing this will eventual go towards unlocking chests left on the sea by your father. Each chest holds clues to where your father is, as well as a unique item that will further excel your farming experience. 

This is currently a prototype and is made purely for feedback on whether or not there would be interest in a game like this.
